Overview: Experience the culture and beauty of Bali on this 7-day adventure. From exploring rice terraces to soaking up the sun on the beaches, this tour offers something for everyone.
MainAttraction: Visit the iconic temples of Bali, including the Ulun Danu Beratan Temple and the Tanah Lot Temple. Experience traditional Balinese culture with a visit to the Ubud Market and a Balinese dance performance.
PriceGuideLine: Prices are per person based on double occupancy. Single supplement and triple occupancy rates are available on request. Prices are exclusive of airfare, visa fees, and any additional taxes or fees.
TermsConditions: Cancellation fees may apply. Please contact us for more information.
Inclusion: Meals as indicated in the itinerary

Faqs.Question: fdsfsdf
Faqs.Answer: <p>Get ready to be blown away with the rich marine diversity and over 100 species of fish that Goa has to offer as we take you on a magical boat ride with your friends and family on an 8 hour excursion on the sea. Sight delightful dolphins on the way to Grandé Island where you get to scuba dive and snorkel in amazing dive sites like Suzy’s Wreck, Coral Garden, Bounty Bay, Lobsters’ Avenue, and Shelter Cove.</p><p>As Goa Tourism's exclusive Diving Centre, we guarantee you an unforgettable and surreal scuba diving experience. In our 3rd season of operation, we were already on TripAdvisor’s ‘The 10 Best India Scuba and Snorkeling Activities.’ We also have the added distinction of being affiliated with PADI and SSI, two of the world's leading diver training organizations. Our PADI and SSI certified instructors have dived in the waters all around the globe and are there to guide you, entertain you, and keep you safe in the event of any exigency. We have the equipment, the tra</p>
